/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is flanked by buildings on both sides, their facades painted in a variety of colors, adding vibrancy to the urban landscape. Cars are parked neatly along the side of the road, hinting at the rhythm of city life. The sky overhead is overcast, casting a soft, diffused light over the scene.
